Lines: As expected of a Red comet,
to create chance for counter attack at such time.
However, I think we are a bit
underprepared to assault Jaburo.
Enemy strength grows each day.
It's never too early to start.
But the reinforcements from African
front won't arrive in time...
If we crush their HQ, enemy will be unable to fight
as an army for some time. Then reinforcements from
space will arrive to finish up this war.
Well, we're going to do it anyway, so we can't lose.
Yes, sir!
I'm scared.. but I'll do my best
Hey, enemy is still excited about their last victory,
and not expecting sudden all-out assault on their HQ
We can do this!
We'll be airdropping from Gau as advance force.
After landing, we will eliminate ground defences,
and support following units.
That's a reasonable first step in this operation.
Okay! Prepare for sortie and board our Gau.
Let's surprise Jaburo!
Roger that!
